titles.title: Freedom's Way National Heritage Area Act
To establish the Freedom's Way National Heritage Area in the States of Massachusetts and New Hampshire, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 2/17/2005--Introduced. Freedom's Way National Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Freedom's Way National Heritage Area encompassing 36 communities in Massachusetts and six communities in New Hampshire that have made important and distinctive contributions to the national character of America.
